body.name: Hello Peach Aluminum Free Deodorant for Women + Men, Natural Fragrance, Dermatologically tested, Baking Soda Free, Parabens Free, Dye Free, 24 Hour Odor Protection, 2 Pack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 17 mins
features: Contains two 2.6 Ounce peach aluminum free naturally friendly hello deodorants
Hello deodorant is dermatologist tested to be gentle on skin and to protect odor for 24 hours
All hello deodorant formulas glide on smooth and contain all-natural fragrances that are perfect for both men and women
Container made from 100% recycled material; vegan & never tested on animals
Free from baking soda, dyes, parabens
body.description: You've asked for naturally friendly peach deodorant, so drumroll please… say hello to peach deodorant with natural fragrance. Thoughtfully created in 100% previously recycled packaging, this lively deo smells great and provides all day friendliness to fight the stink, soothe and moisturize. Anything less would be the pits. But buckle-up, there's more goodness: this deodorant is aluminum free, baking soda free, parabens free, phthalates free, talc free, and dyes free. As if that weren't enough magic, hello is vegan, cruelty free, never tested on animals (Leaping Bunny Certified and PETA recognized). Choose friendly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this deodorant
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the sparkling peach deodorant because I wanted to try the scent. We try to take the more natural route which doesn't always work as well, however this one is a 10/10 for me. I read a lot of reviews where they say the texture is gritty or melted, or even like "rubbing a rock under your armipt", but this didnt seem to have either of those textures. Maybe some bad batches? It arrived yesterday, and I put it on after I took my shower. I did do a lot of running around and cooking and baking and I'm honestly a little surprised as to how I do not smell even a little bit. I was using the coconut scented one before this, and I realized after a few hours, it didn't hold up aswell, but the sparkling peach is holding up very well. This one will be my go to from now on. The only thing I was disappointed about was that it didn't smell like much of anything, a very light hint of peach after you rubbed off the first layer, but I'd rather not smell like anything than a sweaty b.o. peach soup. Ew. Thanks for a great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The peach smells really good. This aluminum free deodorant worlds so good. We used to get another popular brand but since they sold out it stopped working so we switched to this. You still sweat but you don’t stink! Just don’t buy in the summer because it came melted twice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars gross and chunky texture.
reviews.reviewText: Firstly the smell is great but it’s not a obvious peach smell and it doesn’t have a big scent when you put it on so you do not radiate peach smell, unlike regular dove deodorant that will smell strong if you sweat. The hello deodorant is so so weird and has a chunky texture. If you put it on after a while it will rub together and it will for balls of waxy deodorant. I hate the texture as you can see in the picture it’s chunky and stays as a solid on your skin. The deodorant also leaks out of the stick like the picture shows. I also left it on my desk and it leaked a whole puddle of oil when it is not hot in my area it never goes above 80 degrees here unless it’s summertime. I really like the packaging though it is very cute and I wanted to like this because I love peachy scents but this is just not good. Gross and disgusting texture I will be going back to regular dove deodorant. Either I got a bad batch or it’s badly formulated natural deodorant. Don’t waste your money on this if you don’t want the odds of getting chunky deodorant.

reviews.reviewerName: I ordered one and the day after I got it a message popped up on the screen saying the cooling fan is not functioning properly. So I had to get a replacement. It is what it is.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars could be better
reviews.reviewText: It's not the worst and it's not the best. The scent isn't terrible but it doesn't seem to last long. It's also hard to wash off and over time it seems to clump.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works pretty well!
reviews.reviewText: Works pretty well for being natural! My usual natural deodorant has baking soda and is becoming hard to find, so I switched to this one! It’s working not quite as well, but good enough. I have found with all natural deodorants I have to shower daily to keep fresh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Rough and tough
reviews.reviewText: it’s very hard to rub on and feels very tough and thick. Smells great once you actually are able to get out on buuuuuut that soon fades away after a hour or less. I’m not easy to must but after just an hour the fruity smell vanishes then 30 mins later them arms get a little twangy lol. I’ll keep searching:(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this deodorant!
reviews.reviewText: I used to use Native peach deodorant spray, but it didn’t last longer than 2 hours. I looked online for chemical-free deodorants and found this one. Peach scent is honestly my favorite, so I gave this one a try and I really love it! It actually smells like a good deodorant without harmful ingredients, and it lasts me all day, into the next day. I also have really sensitive skin and this doesn’t irritate me or dry me out at all. I definitely recommend! I’ve been using it for a month now and I think it’s safe to say I really love this and would definitely recommend to others trying to find hygiene products without harmful chemicals.
